page.title: 15RECENT LOCAL NEWS STORIES
page.content: The "Newport and Market Drayton Advertiser" is the{local weekly} Shropshire newspaper, and we looked at some old copies. One story was about some{councillors {from Crewe,}who{wanted to take Woore {and Adderley into Cheshire.} Most villagers were very much against this, as they had been when Newcastle wanted to take over Woore. The Parish Council is concerned about {danger on the road}from Gravenhunger. It is narrow and more big lorries have started using it since the miners' strike. A story which kept coming up was about a court case concerning{the village {green}between the Parish Council and a resident of the village. A pleasant story appeared of our own {school's link}with St Mary's School, Altinure in Northern Ireland.
